## Setter type

The function injected by `@inject.setter(bindingKey)`<!-- -->. It sets the underlying binding to a constant value using `binding.to(value)`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Setter<T> = (value: T) => void;
```

## Example


```ts
setterFn('my-value');
```
